name: A Second Chance (itch) (Notequal)
description:
You do not deserve to live for what you have done.

If you can escape alive, you'll earn your second chance.

                                                                                                                                                                                  

Play as a criminal who survived the death sentence with this psychological horror experience. Face the pain you caused from your crimes and blast your way through the horrible undead creations of your victims. Freedom has a high cost.

FEATURES

  • A dungeon crafted specifically to torment the character with references and dangers related to her victims.
  • Conservative shooting where every bullet counts.
  • ~10 minute play-through

CONTROLS

  • Move: WASD
  • Interact: E
  • Close Note: X
  • Fire: Left click
  • Reload: R

DOWNLOAD INSTRUCTIONS

  1. Click the "Download Now" button to download the zipped folder
  2. Extract the files from the folder.
  3. Open the folder for "A Second Chance" and run "A Second Chance.exe"
  4. Have fun! Feel free to let me know your thoughts in the comments.

This game was made for a final project of the Game Production I class at Indiana University under the Media School.
